snippet.title: Shoe Carnival Stock Gaps Up On Today's Open (SCVL)
snippet.description:
Shoe Carnival Stock Gaps Up On Today's Open (SCVL)
By TheStreet Wire 10:55 AM EDT 03/22/12
Shares of Shoe Carnival (Nasdaq:SCVL) were gapping up Thursday morning with an open price 10.2% higher than Wednesday's closing price. The stock closed at $26.50 yesterday and opened today's trading at $29.19.
http://www.thestreet.com/story/11466276/1/shoe-carnival-stock-gaps-up-on-todays-open-scvl.html
